---
title: Convert Base 58 to Base 64
description: Useful script in particular for Squads Tx Builder
---

```tsx
import bs58 from 'bs58';

const base58Transaction = "";

try {
    // Step 1: Decode Base58 string to raw bytes
    const bytes = bs58.decode(base58Transaction);

    // Step 2: Encode the raw bytes to Base64 using Buffer
    const base64Transaction = Buffer.from(bytes).toString('base64');

    console.log("Base64-encoded transaction:", base64Transaction);
} catch (error) {
    console.error("Error:", error.message);
}
```

[Squads Tx Builder](https://docs.squads.so/main/navigating-your-squad/developers-assets/transaction-builder)

[Sign And Send](https://signandsend.vercel.app/)
